verbs.description: In an ongoing legal battle between Donald Trump and Stormy Daniels , things [V: have] gotten very heated . On Saturday , Daniels ' attorney Michael Avenatti took a shot at Trump 's lawyer Rudy Giuliani , claiming that his latest appearances national television has been nothing but an " ultimate circus act . "
